website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot to offer including sizes that make it a fit for most vehicles.
pros: Comes in several sizes and with the option of side window covers
Not too difficult to put on/take off, and also does a good job protecting windshield wipers
cons: Straps have been reported to break after several uses
A few covers arrived missing the mirror covers even though they were ordered

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it’s legit.
customer_reviews.text: Works OK & does the job. However, I’ve had a legit Frost Guard before, and the back of this felt different. It also didn’t have the holes on the side, or the poles that you had to put together upon receipt. For the same price, if not cheaper due to a sale, I should have just gone directly to Frost Guard’s website & purchased there. Live & learn.
customer_reviews.author: WMG

customer_reviews.title: Wind proof!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few by different manufacturers. This is the best one I have found. The rods in the sides keep it flat on the windshield and prevent the wind from blowing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Campbell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well made not flimsy. fits my 03 Toyota Camry like it was made for it. This one is replacing the frost guard I have had for 6 years..the elastic finally pulled away from the body but I think i can resew it.. Very happy with the new cover
customer_reviews.author: LEW

customer_reviews.title: Install and remove quickly *Premium version - Windshield Snow Cover/Security Panel/Wiper Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this item: FrostGuard - Premium Winter Windshield Snow Cover with Security Panel and Wiper Cover. I went for the "Premium" version/Black as I wanted to avoid any movement as the wind blows, which can happen in strong wind gusts and then ice builds up and freezes all to the glass. Well worth +$10 to raise odds that won't happen. As advertised, fast delivery, sturdy item, assembly almost nothing. Went on quick, folded up clean and quick back into the included storage bag. A few times putting on and then taking off and storing again was very convenient-think dressed for work and "let's make this fast" kinda thing. Happy buyer - thanks to seller!
customer_reviews.author: mememeT

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little wide for my 2012 Toyota Corolla, but long enough to cover from top to bottom including the air vents and windshield wipers. I love the rods on the ends, makes it so much easier to take on and off and store. I just roll it up and put it in the back seat. I've only put it out a couple of times this winter, hope it holds up as well as it works!
customer_reviews.author: rareruby

customer_reviews.title: It fits, it’s easy to put on, take off and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the FrostGuard for my 2019 TOYOTA Highlander’s windshield. I live in COLORADO and we have gotten a LOT of snow recently and the FrostGuard not only fits perfectly, it works perfectly! It’s easy to put on and take off and store away. I thought I’d have to do a few returns before I got the right fit and material but to my surprise I kept the first one!
customer_reviews.author: CeciTigre

customer_reviews.title: Standard - perfect fit for my Toyota Camry
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this as a gift, but had a change of heart and ended up keeping it for myself. Am I glad I did! I was very pleasantly surprised by how well this was made, how well it fit my car, and how well it stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Paula W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My parents just moved and need to park outside now. This will save them front having to clear their windshield. Came just in time for a major ice/snow storm. They were the envy of their neighbors...all of whom wanted to know where they could get one!
customer_reviews.author: bamc

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worked well on my windshield. Loved the weight of it. Stayed in place. The bars on the side really helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and has made cleaning the car in the winter a much, much easier task! Easy to put on and very effective!
customer_reviews.author: Elysa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my parents for their cars here in NY. Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: lilklynch

customer_reviews.title: Does not freeze in sleet and freezing rain.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece with the mirror guards. Only problem is the x-large does not allow me to close the doors on my 2014 Ford Explorer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winter car care.
customer_reviews.text: The Frost Guard is perfect, it arrived just on time because it snowed the same day & covered the entire windshield & looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Holiday gift for my parents
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sent it to my parents as a gift, work wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Pro FrostGuard PREMIUM
customer_reviews.text: Good product the large one fit my whole HONDA CRV Windshield . Mine arrived missing the drivers side mirror cover. I'm STILL waiting for one to be sent.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Tester

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Extra large means small. Won't fit!
customer_reviews.text: To small!! I ordered an extra large for my truck. Doesn't even reach the side of the window for a standard size truck window. How can you call this extra large?? Don't waste your money unless you are ordering it for a tiny small car. Waste of time and money. I am returning it. False advertising to say it's extra large. BS
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one I’ve used and I am very happy with it. But I have had it for a very short time and not used it much either and it already has a hole. I have no idea how it got a hole buy it is still usable. Otherwise I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. I had shoulder surgery and I cant scrape my windows yet so this saves me so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great even in windy conditions
customer_reviews.text: Great ice and snow shield. Simply pull it off the windshield and drive off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Size to small.
customer_reviews.text: Xl size doesn't fit my ram 1500 . 🤣 should have new better. Way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: No snow or ice cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Great item no more cleaning off snow or waiting for ice to melt on hot winshield
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hornak

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Time will tell regarding the quality of the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Turk

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Rolls up nice into the storage pouch. Good fit for Subaru criss trex. Quality straps. Worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Best one I ever bought. Works perfect in snow country. I live in MI and we have snow!!! And also the wind dont blow it away. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: How quickly it can be installed and removed
customer_reviews.text: I would like it better if it could be installed on a wet window. I use it for frost and ice protection as I have no garage.
customer_reviews.author: tmbwd

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my wife wouldn’t have to scrape her windshield anymore. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly large coverage and thick and doesn't blow off in windy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to just pull the cover off and have a clear window
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was the one end was ripped a little so I had to sew it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and loved it so much all the vehicle's got one.
customer_reviews.author: juztbecause

customer_reviews.title: Greatest
customer_reviews.text: With the ice then snow that we have been getting, this is great
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Safe From Frost
customer_reviews.text: This frost guard works great. You can put it on in 5 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Slaton

customer_reviews.title: The fast way to get going on a snowy morning
customer_reviews.text: Even with several inches of snow, this worked pretty well. My neighbors were brushing snow off their windshields and scraping ice. I walked out and removed this cover and shook the snow off. I threw it in the back seat and drove away. Now that's convenience.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Let it snow
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Saves me tons of time in the AM in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and materials
customer_reviews.text: Fits correctly for my car and easy to put on and take off. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This did not prevent snow and ice from getting into the windows. (My car model was listed.) The strap broke on the first use. I bought it early to be prepared, but lost the return window. When you do take it odd, the ice and snow are stuck to it and is very hard to clean off. So, it ended up wet in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny in Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota, and my car lives outside in Minnesota. I don't know why someone didn't tell me about these things years ago, but the cumulative number of hours of scraping my windshield this thing has saved me in the last month is more than worth the price. I also appreciate the rods in the sides which hold it in place in high winds - snow didn't get under it when the car was in the lot during blizzard conditions. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I don't trust these.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a couple of these at my workplace employee parking lot, so I looked it up. I followed one reviewer's advice and bought it from the manufacturer's website. It's cheaper, they have a size chart, and you get the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product all round! It takes some doing to get it off after a heavy snow plus rain storm though, as is probably expected.
customer_reviews.author: BADOTEY

customer_reviews.title: Does 99% of the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a Honda Civic.Doesn’t cover my windshield 100%. Needs to be a bit bigger 😞
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

product_meta.title: FrostGuard - Premium Winter Windshield Snow Cover with Security Panel and Wiper Cover, Protects from Snow, Ice and Frost (Standard, Black)
feature_bullets: COVERS WINDSHIELD, WIPERS AND SIDE VIEW MIRRORS - The ultimate winter car cover, FrostGuard Vortex reduces the need to use an ice scraper or de-ice your vehicle and prevents your windshield and wiper blades from freezing. With two sizes, you can find the perfect balance of a snug fit and great coverage against wintery elements.

WEATHER RESISTANT CONSTRUCTION - Heavy weight polyester backed with a weather-resistant PVC lining to make it stick-resistant. Fiberglass poles hold the snow and ice screen taught against your windshield to prevent it from flapping in the wind.

SUPERIOR WIND RESISTANCE - Two security flaps with sewn-in PVC tubes shut in vehicle doors to provide a snug fit against winter winds. The Fit-Fast elastic straps go around your side view mirrors for added wind resistance. Easy to use, it goes on and comes off in seconds.

STORAGE POUCH MEANS NO SOGGY BACK SEAT - When you remove the winter windshield cover, roll it up and slide it into the quick dry storage pouch to prevent melt off from soaking your back seat. The side poles fold down for even tighter storage during warmer weather months.

THREE YEAR WARRANTY - The leading winter windshield cover, you can trust FrostGuard to hold up against the fiercest of winter weather. If you have any trouble, our Nashville-based customer service team is standing by to help.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
